short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This plugin simply checks if the website you are visiting belongs to one of the major banking or payment platforms in South Africa.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: We have created a simple browser extension that will indicate when you are visiting a website representing one of the major banking or payment platforms in South Africa. You can click on the MoneySafe icon to confirm that a site is on our trusted list. You are also able to report a technical issue with a legitimate website or report that a website is being deceptive. We will forward your query on to the relevant institution.
